Package org.uma.jmetal.component.catalogue.ea.selection.impl

Class RandomSelection<S extends Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.component.catalogue.ea.selection.impl.RandomSelection<S>
Type Parameters:
S -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Selection<S>
public class RandomSelection<S extends Solution<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Selection<S>
Randomly select a number of solutions from a list, with or without replacement
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro (ajnebro@uma.es)

    RandomSelection​(int numberOfElementsToSelect, boolean withReplacement, BoundedRandomGenerator<java.lang.Integer> pseudoRandomGenerator)
    Constructor The check of invalid parameter values are omitted assuming that they are applied in the ListUtils.randomSelectionWithoutReplacement(int, List) and ListUtils.randomSelectionWithReplacement(int, List) methods used in the implementation of method select(List)
